h1. Create Cloud Space

Your private cloud resource pool including compute, storage, applications, desktop & networking capacity.

Organize your capacity over different Cloud Spaces! Each Cloud Space has its own credit capacity, a separate Defense Shield and separate user management.

See the [pricing page|Pricing] for the cost of creating an additional Cloud Space.
